properties.entry: INSERT INTO CHARACTER_SKIN(SKIN_ID, SAVE_ROOT, CHARACTER_PRICE, REWARD) VALUES( SEQ_SKIN.NEXTVAL , '/resource/img/user/skin'||SEQ_SKIN.CURRVAL, ?, ? )
SELECT SEQ_SKIN.CURRVAL AS CURRVAL FROM DUAL
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM CHARACTER_SKIN
SELECT SKIN_ID, SAVE_ROOT, CHARACTER_PRICE, REWARD FROM CHARACTER_SKIN WHERE REWARD = 'Y' AND SKIN_ID != 0
SELECT SKIN_ID, SAVE_ROOT, CHARACTER_PRICE, REWARD FROM (SELECT * FROM CHARACTER_SKIN WHERE REWARD = 'N' AND SKIN_ID != 0 ORDER BY SKIN_ID DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY ROWNUM
SELECT SKIN_ID, SAVE_ROOT, CHARACTER_PRICE, REWARD FROM CHARACTER_SKIN WHERE SKIN_ID = ?
